name: Chapter 2: The Plan
short_description: Bubbles and his friends brainstorm ideas for escaping the tank. They decide to utilize the pet store’s cleaning routine as the perfect opportunity. However, tensions rise as not everyone is convinced the plan will work.
events: Brainstorming session, conflict among tank-mates, decision to use cleaning routine for escape.
from_prev_chapter: Bubbles has an idea for the escape.
to_next_chapter: They decide on the day of the escape.

beats.description: Bubbles gathers his tank-mates Finley, Lola, and Guppy to discuss potential escape plans. They are all excited and nervous about the possibility of freedom.
Each fish proposes various ideas for escaping the tank, from jumping out when the lid is opened to tricking the humans into moving them to a different tank.
As the brainstorming progresses, doubts and concerns start to surface. Guppy, in particular, is skeptical about the success of any plan they come up with.

beats.long_title: Discovery of the Cleaning Routine Opportunity
beats.description: Finley remembers the regular cleaning routine and suggests using it as their opportunity to escape. The fish discuss the feasibility of this new idea.

beats.long_title: Detailed Planning for the Cleaning Routine Escape
beats.description: Bubbles takes charge and starts formulating a detailed plan on how they can leverage the cleaning routine for their escape.
Tensions rise as Lola and Guppy express their concerns about the new plan. An argument ensues, highlighting the differing opinions and levels of trust among the fish.
Bubbles steps in to reassure his friends, sharing motivational words and emphasizing the importance of trusting each other to achieve their common goal.

beats.long_title: Assigning Specific Roles for the Escape Plan
beats.description: The fish outline specific roles and tasks for each member to ensure a smooth execution of their escape plan during the cleaning routine.
To ensure they are all prepared, the fish practice their assigned roles and go over the plan multiple times, refining it based on what they learn during rehearsals.

beats.long_title: Final Agreement on the Escape Plan and Building Anticipation
beats.description: With a solid plan in place, the fish come to a final agreement and start building anticipation for the day of their escape, feeling a mix of excitement and nervousness.
